member.name: USEROBJECTFLAGS
member.summary: Contains information about a window station or desktop handle.

member.name: USEROBJECTFLAGS.fInherit
member.summary: If this member is TRUE, new processes inherit the handle. Otherwise, the handle is not inherited.

member.name: USEROBJECTFLAGS.fReserved
member.summary: Reserved for future use. This member must be FALSE.

summary.para: For window stations, this member can contain the following window station attribute.

listheader.description: Window station has visible display surfaces.

summary.para: For desktops, the dwFlags member can contain the following value.

listheader.description: Allows processes running in other accounts on the desktop to set hooks in this process.
